A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After a strong set up by JJ Abrams\, Rian Johnson's film is just a story telling disaster.  I'm not even sure what I should be waiting or wanting to see in Episode IX.  It didn't move the story along or do any substantial character development except to put a crap finish on Luke Skywalker's character.   And worst of all it took everything great about Star Wars and basically thumbed its nose at it.  With the success of Rogue One and even Force Awakens\, why the sudden tone deafness to the reverence due to this franchise?  Just disgusted.
